keyword: how many calories in a tootsie roll
title: How Many Calories in a Tootsie Roll?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a tootsie roll, plus detailed nutrition facts like carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and sodium per piece.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tootsie Roll?
assumptions: Standard small Tootsie Roll candy (approx. 9.5g), chocolate-flavored chewy taffy; no wrappers or additional coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, brand batch, and exact formulation. Check packaging for precise values when available.

quick_answer.text: A single standard Tootsie Roll contains about 35 calories and 7g of carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: King-size Tootsie Roll (approx. double the standard size)
Tootsie Roll with added caramel center

faqs.q: How many calories in a Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: About 35 calories per standard small piece.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 7.4g total carbs, including 5.1g sugars and 0.2g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Roll have fat or protein?
faqs.a: It has 0.5g total fat (0.3g saturated) and 0.3g protein.
Yes, only about 2mg sodium per piece.

faqs.q: How does Tootsie Roll size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller midgees have ~14 kcal each; king-size can double to 70 kcal.
